title: This Headset VIBRATES!  Razer Nari Ultimate Gaming Headset
description: The Razer Nari Ultimate gaming headset offers a unique haptic feedback system that vibrates during gaming.  It is a unique experience but does it actually improve the experience or cause other problems?    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Razer Nari Ultimate Gaming Headset:   Razer Nari Wireless Gaming Headset:     Razer Nari Essential Gaming Headset:   Toshiba RC100:   HP Omen Mindframe:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Razer. This video is sponsored by Toshiba. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #razernari #gamingheadset #hardwarecanucks
